content.title: Dividing your money and property
content.disagreeWithPartener: If you disagree with your {{ divorceWho }} about how your property, money, pensions and other assets will be split, then you can ask the court to decide for you. This includes maintenance payments.
content.financialOrders: These decisions are called 'financial orders'. You can apply for orders for yourself, and/or, if appropriate, for your children.
content.info: If you both agree on how to split your money and property and want to make it legally binding, you can apply for a 'consent order'.
content.helpLink: Find out more about financial orders
content.helpBothAgreeTitle: If you both agree on how to divide your money and property
content.helpBothAgreeContent: You can ask the court to make a 'consent order' if you agree on how to divide your money and property. You should get a solicitor to draft the consent order, and then send it to the court with the £50 fee.
content.helpApplyingContent1: To formally start legal proceedings, you’ll also need to complete another form (known as Form A) and pay a fee of £{{ financialOrderApplicationFee }}.
content.helpApplyingContent2: This means that if you select yes to the following question:
content.helpDontProceed: you don’t have to proceed with the application for a financial order
content.helpProceedAlive: you can proceed with the application for a financial order at any time in the future while your {{ divorceWho }} is alive
content.helpApplyingContent3: If you select no, you can still apply for a financial order in future, but you’ll be more limited in that you can only do so until you remarry or form a civil partnership. This rule doesn’t apply to pension sharing or pension compensation sharing orders which can be applied for anytime.
content.helpApplyingContent4: You should get legal advice if you’re not sure what to do.
content.helpChildMaintenanceContent: The court can only make financial orders for children under certain circumstances. You’ll usually either need to come to an agreement with your {{ divorceWho }} (which you can then make legally binding with a consent order) or use the Child Maintenance Service.

content.title: Rhannu eich arian a’ch eiddo
content.disagreeWithPartener: Os ydych yn anghytuno gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }} o ran sut y bydd eich eiddo, eich arian, eich pensiynau a’ch asedau eraill yn cael eu rhannu, yna gallwch ofyn i’r llys benderfynu ar eich rhan. Mae hyn yn cynnwys taliadau cynnal plant.
content.financialOrders: Gelwir y penderfyniadau hyn yn 'orchmynion ariannol'. Gallwch wneud cais am orchmynion i chi eich hun, ac/neu, os yw’n berthnasol, i’ch plant.
content.info: Os yw’r ddau ohonoch yn cytuno sut y bydd eich arian a’ch eiddo yn cael ei rannu, a’ch bod am i hynny fod yn gyfreithiol rwymol, gallwch wneud cais am ‘orchymyn cydsynio’.
content.helpLink: Dod i wybod mwy am orchmynion ariannol
content.helpBothAgreeTitle: Os ydych yn gytûn ynglyn â sut i rannu eich arian a’ch eiddo
content.helpBothAgreeContent: Gallwch ofyn i’r llys wneud ‘gorchymyn cydsynio’ os ydych yn gytûn ynglyn â sut i rannu eich arian a’ch eiddo. Bydd angen i chi ofyn i gyfreithiwr ddrafftio’r gorchymyn cydsynio, ac yna ei anfon i’r llys gyda’r ffi o £50.
content.helpApplyingContent1: I gychwyn achosion ariannol yn ffurfiol, bydd angen i chi lenwi ffurflen arall (a elwir yn Ffurflen A) a thalu ffi £{{ financialOrderApplicationFee }}.
content.helpApplyingContent2: Golyga hyn os byddwch yn ateb y cwestiwn canlynol yn gadarnhaol:
content.helpDontProceed: nad oes raid ichi fwrw ymlaen gyda chais am orchymyn ariannol
content.helpProceedAlive: gallwch fwrw ymlaen gyda’r cais am orchymyn ariannol unrhyw bryd yn y dyfodol tra bo eich {{ divorceWho }} yn fyw
content.helpApplyingContent3: Os byddwch yn rhoi ateb na, byddwch yn gallu gwneud cais am orchymyn ariannol yn y dyfodol yr un fath ond ni fyddwch yn gallu gwneud hynny ar ôl ichi ailbriodi neu uno mewn partneriaeth sifil. Nid yw’r rheol hon yn berthnasol i orchmynion rhannu pensiwn neu orchmynion rhannu iawndal y gellir gwneud cais amdanynt ar unrhyw adeg.
content.helpApplyingContent4: Dylech gael cyngor cyfreithiol os nad ydych yn siwr beth i’w wneud.
content.helpChildMaintenanceContent: Ni all y llys wneud gorchmynion ariannol ar gyfer plant ond mewn rhai amgylchiadau penodol. Gan amlaf, bydd angen ichi ddod i gytundeb gyda’ch {{ divorceWho }} (a gallwch wedyn ei wneud yn gyfreithiol rwymol gyda gorchymyn cydsynio) neu ddefnyddio’r Gwasanaeth Cynhaliaeth Plant.
